price: 51. Tetapi orang-orang yang berusaha menentang ayat-ayat Kami dengan maksud melemahkan (kemauan untuk beriman), mereka itu adalah penghuni-penghuni neraka Jahim.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ سَعَوۡاْ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مُعَٰجِزِينَ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna saʿaw fī āyātinā muʿājizīna ulāika aṣḥābu al-jaḥīmi
